title: GeForce Now takes a page from Stadia’s playbook, adds free game demos for members
content:
Google has boosted Stadia’s free-to-play aspect with a handful of free demos, and it seems Nvidia wants to do the same thing. Starting this week, GeForce Now is offering free-to-play game demos for a handful of titles.

more…

The post GeForce Now takes a page from Stadia’s playbook, adds free game demos for members appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Nvidia has announced that GeForce Now will start providing game demos to members as a chance to try a game before buying the full title.
